item.description:
@fallen_darkness wrote:

Okay i added this to my client.

if(i == 9003) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 7211; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 7207;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 7207;//female wearing class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Bandos Godsword";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A heavy sword".getBytes();//examin info }

and whenever i log out then back in it turns into a fucking evil dave head!!! any1 help?
